function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of feasibility studies and planning for the implementation of innovative projects may result in ineffective and unsustainable outcomes.","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proximity-based entrepreneurial innovations may lead to increased interaction and exposure among individuals, potentially contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient investment capacity for digital visibility","category":"Lower investment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Liquidity crisis due to pandemic","category":"Financial strains and liquidity crises","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The emerging growth of mobile commerce and e-commerce may lead to an increase in physical interaction and foot traffic in retail spaces, leading to a higher risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Geographical proximity between countries in the same supply chain favoring the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relaunch of territories’ economies depending on the indirect effects of the knowledge economy from a proximity perspective.","category":"Supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proximity trade involving retail sale of products within a contained area could facilitate the spread of contagious diseases due to the close proximity of customers and employees.","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on local businesses and trade for essential services","category":"Supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on real estate sector in turkey","category":"Construction industry impacts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effects of social distancing on tourism, retail, and manufacturing sectors","category":"Discontinuity of services","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High risk of economic loss due to prolonged closure of retail sales","category":"Discontinuity of services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of permanent closure of small businesses","category":"Workforce and labor shortages","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of continued economic decline in service and entertainment sectors","category":"Global recession and economic instability","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decrease in employment","category":"Lower employment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collapse in retail sales","category":"Discontinuity of services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global recession impacting growth prospects","category":"Global recession and economic instability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruptions in industrial manufacturing and drop in commodity prices","category":"Construction industry impacts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on global suppliers leading to shortages of essential goods and equipment.","category":"Supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased energy consumption in residential buildings due to work from home practices during covid-19 lockdown","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruption of supply chains and logistical challenges during quarantine","category":"Supply chain disruptions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic fallout leading to increased poverty and malnutrition in central asian countries","category":"Global recession and economic instability","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased household energy consumption due to remote work and lockdowns","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sudden drop in economic activity during lockdowns making it difficult for several population classes to pay for increasing housing costs.","category":"Financial strains and liquidity crises","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of independent local stores and pharmacies leading to a crisis during lockdowns due to insufficient reserves in food and medicines.","category":"Discontinuity of services","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on residential building design","category":"Construction industry impacts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on external food supply","category":"Supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of measurement for water usage reduction may lead to inaccurate assessment of water-saving efficiency.","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased consumption of nonrenewable risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited focus on economic sustainability in green building certification systems","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High energy consumption and inefficiency","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased pressure on energy sources during pandemics","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased household energy consumption due to people spending most of their time at home during the pandemic.","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding the long-term sustainability impact of the pandemic on built
